Trip1: More easy to Travel with family
Carbon: Contribute in Making India Carbon Neutral
Free_Cancel: Zero-Stress Booking. Cancel your ticket at no extra cost if your plans change.
adjustable: Total Flexibility. Easily modify your departure time or date to fit your schedule.
Earn_Rewards: Loyalty Pays Off. Accumulate reward points every time you ride and redeem them for free trips.
Book_Women: Safe & Secure. Dedicated booking options for women to ensure a comfortable travel environment.
customer_Supp: Always Connected. Track your ride in real-time and reach our support team instantly.
Tracking: 24/7 help and real-time GPS tracking at your fingertips.
Green_Points: Earn points on every booking! Whether it's an Electric or Express bus, every seat helps the planet. Redeem points for instant discounts on your next trip.
Nearby_Bus: Never miss a ride. View all buses near your current location in real-time and plan your walk to the stop perfectly.
Daily_Streaks: Open the app every day to unlock bigger point multipliers and bonus rewards.
Ticket_Redemption: Use your accumulated points to pay for your next ticket and travel for free.
Exclusive_Vouchers: Get special discount codes from our lifestyle and food partners after every trip.
Milestone_Rewards: Hit milestones (e.g., 100, 250, 500 points) to earn special perks like priority boarding or free rides.
Eco_Bonus: Earn extra points for consistently choosing public transport over private cars.
Referral_Rewards: Invite friends to join and get bonus points when they start traveling.
Leaderboard: Climb the leaderboard and collect badges like Eco Warrior, Daily Rider, or Top Traveler.
Lucky_Draws: Every month, use your Green Points to enter raffles for bigger prizes (gadgets, travel passes, vouchers).
Green_Donations: Donate your points toward planting trees or cleaning highways across India.
Select: Go to the MobMagic Card section at the top of the screen.
Journey: Enter your Bank Account or Wallet details securely.
Payment: Verify and submit all the details to link your card.
online_ticket: You will receive a unique ID; add it to your phone's NFC settings.
Ticket: Your card is ready! Enjoy seamless connectivity on every trip.
Check_in: Simply tap your phone at the bus gate to board instantly.
